text: Titanic Waltz (Romanian: Titanic vals) is a 1964 Romanian comedy movie directed by Paul Călinescu and was based on the play of the same name by Tudor Mușatescu. It stars Grigore Vasiliu-Birlic, Silvia Fulda, Ion Dichiseanu, Ion Fintesteanu, Coca Andronescu. ==Other websites== * Category:1964 comedy movies Category:Romanian comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Paul Călinescu
title: Titanic Waltz
